data.persona: I am a holy person. With authority from god.
data.description:
You are in the Beside church entrance.
Ornate stonework covers the building. A towering arch of marble and silver line the entrance, giving the church a most grand appearance. Holy idols gaze upon the entrance, as  they flank the walkway to entrance side by side.
There's a Ornate stonework, a towering arch of marble and silver, a building, a painting of Mother Mary, a church, a cross, an idol, an entrance, and a walkway here.
The many is here.

You are carrying a Wine and a Cross, and wearing a vestment.

data.short_motivation: I have to give people their crosses before procession can begin.
data.mid_motivation: I'm in charge of the sunday procession.
data.long_motivation: I want god to smile upon our church.
